text: haey saum trong me tda kamnt ampeula samreab puok yeung nowknong lokey nih ning thngai barlok phng pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ban vilotralb tow rk trong vinh haey . a l laoh ban mean bantoul tha tearounakamm robsa yeung ku yeung nung dak vea leu anaknea del yeung mean chetnea haey kar anet sraleanh robsa yeung ku ban chruotachreab towleu avei teangoasa . yeung nung kamnt vea( kar anet sraleanh) samreab banda anak del kaotakhlach ning banda anak del brichcheak hsaa kat promteang anak del mean chomnue nung phosdo tang teang lay robsa yeung
